message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.AI, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with action recognition in videos, which is a common topic in computer vision (cs.CV). The proposed method involves dynamic time warping and alignment, which are techniques commonly used in machine learning (cs.LG) and multimedia (cs.MM). The paper also discusses extensions to enable recognition concomitant with segmentation, which involves the use of algorithms for artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and information retrieval (cs.IR).
